title: Sample, ca. 1948
medium:
Medium: synthetic
Technique: 2/2 twill plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20 x 21 cm (7 7/8 x 8 1/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description: Sample of twill plaid in shades of dark red and gray. Warp has stripes of gray and dark red boucle yarn while the weft is comprised of smooth dark red yarn, smooth gray yarn, a wrapped silver yarn, flat silver yarn and silver braid.
